Description of incident: doTerra notified customers of a data breach when a third party data  provider that their system was accessed by an unauthorized party. The  information included names, Social Security numbers, other government  issued i.d. numbers, payment card information, dates of birth, postal  and email addresses, telephone numbers, and usernames and passwords.More Information: http://www.scmagazine.com/d%C5%8Dterra-breach-exposes-customer-info-incl...
